sections.TOP:
Rodeo FX0276856ab846pwbaqledezzm429gdmszcquaj1607412014-09-28T01:43:19ZThe Dragon Demands5014364'''Rodeo FX''' is a visual effects company based out of Montreal, Canada. It was one of the main special effects vendors working on ''Game of Thrones'' [[Season 4]], for which it won the 2014 Creative Arts Emmy for Outstanding Special and Visual Effects.

Rodeo FX created a total of 150 shots for Season 4 over the span of six months with the help of over 100 artists, project managers, and technicians. Shots they worked on included the city of [[Meereen]], the [[Unsullied]] army at Meereen's gates, the White Walker's [[Wights|wight-horse]], the [[Direwolves]], and the shot of Stannis Baratheon's cavalry charging during the [[Battle of Castle Black]].<ref>[http://watchersonthewall.com/rodeo-fx-breaks-emmy-award-winning-work-game-of-thrones-season-4/ Rodeo FX breaks down their Emmy Award winning work on season 4]</ref>
sections.See also: *[http://www.rodeofx.com/all-films/got Rodeo FX's website] - with a demo video showcasing their work on ''Game of Thrones'' Season 4.
